entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 90
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 105 IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HOT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 70S
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
